    @ConditionalOnExpression("\'${js.evaluator:null}\'==\'remote\' && (\'${service.type:null}\'==\'monolith\' || \'${service.type:null}\'==\'tb-core\' || \'${service.type:null}\'==\'tb-rule-engine\')")
@Service
public class RemoteJsInvokeService
extends AbstractJsInvokeService
